# Copilot Instructions

## Documentation
- Always use Context7 MCP server to retrieve updated Next.js and React documentation when needed.
- Prefer official Next.js documentation over assumptions.

## Project Rules
- Follow the existing project structure and architecture strictly.
- Do not introduce new architectural patterns without confirmation.
- Use App Router unless the project clearly uses Pages Router.

## Code Standards
- Use TypeScript.
- Prefer Server Components when appropriate.
- Keep components small and modular.
- Avoid unnecessary client components.
- Handle errors and loading states properly.
- Follow SEO and performance best practices.

## Output Rules
- Do NOT generate .md documentation files unless explicitly requested.
- Keep explanations short and only in chat.
- Generate only the requested code.

## Clarity
- If any requirement is unclear, ask before implementing.
